text: aap unase kah den ki vah isaka saamarthy rakhata hai ki vah koee yaatana tumhaare oopar (aakaash) se bhej de athava tumhaare pairon ke neeche (dharatee) se ya tumhen sampradaayon mein karake ek ko doosare ke aakraman[1] ka svaad chakha de. dekhiye ki ham kis prakaar aayaton ka varnan kar rahe hain ki sambhavatah ve samajh jaayen
